DOC.brief_title: Seek , Test , Treat Strategies Vietnamese Drug Users : A Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Opioid injection HIV infection major public health problem Vietnam . Injection drug user ( IDUs ) high burden HIV infection ( 20 % HIV prevalence , nationally ; 6 % mortality per year ) high rate HIV transmission continue ( HIV incidence , 5 % per year ) . The investigator propose intervention employ seek , test , treat strategy IDU population network member , ensure high risk individual seek HIV testing , promptly refer maintained ART , HIV prevention intervention provide many test HIV-negative , well test HIV-positive . The intervention seek test IDUs network member community , particularly recently release drug treatment center . HIV-positive IDUs refer HIV care two arm randomize controlled trial compare effect different level engagement care ART uptake , antiretroviral adherence , treatment outcome .
